plays.text: Penalty to Maxime Talbot 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Thomas Pock
Goal scored by Petr Prucha assisted by Petr Sykora AND Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Hooking John LeClair
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for Tripping Tomas Surovy
Penalty to Thomas Pock 2 minutes for Hooking Tomas Surovy
Goal scored by Dick Tarnstrom assisted by Tomas Surovy AND Sidney Crosby
Penalty to Tomas Surovy 2 minutes for High Sticking Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Guillaume Lefebvre 2 minutes for Holding Michael Nylander
Goal scored by Petr Prucha assisted by Michael Nylander AND Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Holding Colby Armstrong
Goal scored by Sidney Crosby assisted by Colby Armstrong AND John LeClair
Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Colby Armstrong
Penalty to Sidney Crosby 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Henrik Lundqvist
Goal scored by Michal Rozsival assisted by Petr Prucha AND Fedor Tyutin
Goal scored by Michael Nylander assisted by Ville Nieminen AND Tom Poti
